name: Hidden Visage
description:
The villagers, after suffering from the curse of the monster who has been plaguing their land and laying waste to their people, try to take on arms and free themselves and their land of its clutches. Fight against waves of villagers trying to avenge the victims and their fallen comrades and test your strength to see who will be the last one standing.

Spooktober Gamejam

Hidden visage was made under a week during the Spooktober game jam.

Credits

Caphos1 - Code & Art

Lampazzu - Music & Concepts

artisticdude, tarfmagougou, jute & Michel Baradari (various sound effects) at opengameart.org

Controls

[WASD/Arrows] Move

[Space/Up] Jump

[LMB] Attack

[E] Interact

[B] Ghost Ability

[L-SHIFT] Dash Ability
